hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local

Class LocalizationProviderBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.AbstractLocalizationProvider
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.LocalizationProviderBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationListener, ILocalizationProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormLocalizationProvider

    public class LocalizationProviderBridge
extends AbstractLocalizationProvider
implements ILocalizationListener
    Class used as a bridge between the localization provider and the registered listeners. It is used to keep the list of listeners so that the localization provider doesn't keep the references to them.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB
